item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "I've never made fun of you. Making fun of you would imply that something about you is fun." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "You’re so freaking romantic. I don’t know how I keep my pants on." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "Falling in love or just plain falling : they were both terrifying at any speed" -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description:
"You ever get gut feelings? Like you see something and just know?' Ty asked, feeling stupid but not caring. He felt Zane squeeze his hand. "First time I saw you, after I got over hating you, I knew, I knew we'd die together. I could just feel it deep down.'
Zane exhaled heavily. 'Not today. And not tomorrow. And not for a long time to come, Ty Grady. You hear me? A hell of a long time.'
Ty nodded jerkily...
...Several heartbeats of quiet passed before Zane spoke. 'First time I saw you, after i got over hating you, I knew,' he said echoing Ty's words, 'I knew I'd fall in love with you...I laughed at myself,' Zane cotinued, a hint of pleading in his voice, 'and then I denied it, and then I did everything I could to prove myself wrong, but it didn't work...Ty,' Zane's even, soothing tones finally broke on the short gasp of his name. 'I love you and I'm scared I'll lose you. Please don't leave me a lone in the dark." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description:
"The front door flew open, and Mary shot out of the house, jumping off the porch, not even bothering with the steps to the ground. She ran over the frost-laden grass in her bare feet and threw herself at him, grabbing on to his neck with both arms. She held him so tightly his spine cracked.
She was sobbing. Bawling. Crying so hard her whole body was shaking.
He didn't ask any questions, just wrapped himself around her.
I'm not okay," she said hoarsely between breaths. "Rhage...I'm not okay." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "You told me one time that . . . I was your compass. I gave you direction when you were lost,” Ty said, nearly choking on the words. He glanced up, eyes reflecting like liquid in the low light. “Well, you were my anchor. You were something solid for me to hold onto. I wanted you to remember that." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "Goddammit!” Zane lashed out without warning and hit the water bottle, sending it skidding across the carpet and splattering at Julian’s feet. “I’m gonna end up in the fucking madhouse because of you!” He reached out and grabbed Ty’s wrist, pulling him closer. “Loving you is going to make me fucking insane! I said no, and I mean it!" -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "I would have done anything. <i>Anything</i> to get back to you. I can’t say I’m sorry for that." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "I didn’t care about anybody, even myself. And when I did….” Zane’s jaw clenched, and he kept his eyes focused on the window. Anything but on the man sitting across from him. “I let him walk away" -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "Why a compass?” Ty asked. He hadn’t taken his eyes off Zane’s yet. Zane smiled and ran his thumb across the pendant. “Because you gave me direction when I was lost. You showed me the way.” He looked up to meet Ty’s eyes. “You’re like my very own compass." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description:
"I will not fall in love with you," she said. "I can't let myself. I won't."
"That's all right. I'll love you enough for the both of us." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Aly add a quote by J.R. Ward
Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Just because you can doesn't mean you should." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Simi? What was it you told me once about families? We have three kinds of family. Those we are born to, those who are born to us, and those we let into our hearts." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "Because… you make me the kind of person I’ve always wished I was." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "The prospect of calling Zane’s parents to tell them he was seriously injured, and oh, by the way, I’m your son’s partner who let him go by himself into the building that blew up, nice to meet you, has he told you he likes cock?" -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "I’m sorry. Walls are closing in and I need to go. Love you." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Abigail Roux
item.description: "Julian met Cameron’s eyes. “I’ll die before anything happens to you,” he promised. “That’s what I’m afraid of,” Cameron whispered." -- Abigail Roux

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Cupid, you worthless bastard, I summon you to human form! (Julian) Gee, I can't imagine why he wouldn't respond to that. (Grace)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "There are some pains that run too deep for anything to absolve them. The best we can do is pick up the pieces and hope for the strength we need to keep going. (Acheron) Is that what you do? (Tory) No, I beat shit up – that helps even more. (Acheron)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Even if I were lying on the sun itself, I would be freezing there without you. (Zarek)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I have found my star. She is beauty and grace. Elegance and goodness. My laughter in winter. She is courageous and strong. Bold and tempting. Unlike any other in all the universe, and I cannot touch her. I dare not even try." [Zarek]" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "What the hell are you? (Desiderius) I'm her godfather, with a heavy emphasis on the god part. (Acheron)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I can't believe you married a justice nymph and have yet to learn anything from her. There are always three sides to every memory, Z. Yours, theirs, and the truth, which lies somewhere in between the two. (Acheron)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Aly add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I know who I WAS when I got up this morning, but I think I must have been changed several times since then" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Aly add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Curiouser and curiouser." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Aly add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I'm not strange, weird, off, nor crazy, my reality is just different from yours." -- Lewis Carroll
